name: Here are your cubes (HAYC)
description:
Here are your cubes: you can take them and use them. It is an atmospheric and metaphoric game about many things.

Be free to interpret. 

The game has no end, so you need to exit or restart when you feel like it.

Controls: Move around with WASD, look around with the mouse, grab and use cube with E (or left clic)

It should work with controler but it hasn't been tested.

The prototype has beeen developed during the GGJ2020. HAYC is currently being remade and extended in Unreal Engine.

Credits:

Stéphanie Mader

Guillaume Tiger

Catherine Rolland
